IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PROVIDING EDUCATION, AWARENESS AND COORDINATED HEALTH CARE SERVICES AND PROGRAMS FOR THE UNDERSERVED AND UNINSURED INDIVIDUALS AND FAMILIES IN THE COMMUNITY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: PROVIDING EDUCATION, AWARENESS AND COORDINATED HEALTH CARE SERVICES AND PROGRAMS FOR THE UNDERSERVED AND UNINSURED INDIVIDUALS AND FAMILIES IN THE COMMUNITY.
IRS990.Desc: PROVIDE LOW COST MEDICAL AND BEHAVIORAL HEALTH ASSISTANCE TO RESIDENTS OF HENRY COUNTY THROUGH THE COMMUNITY HEALTH CENTERS IN BASSETT AND RIDGEWAY, VA.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: PROVIDE HEALTH SCREENINGS, PHYSICAL ACTIVITY PROGRAMS, NUTRITIONAL AND OTHER EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS THROUGH COMMUNITY AND AFTER SCHOOL PROGRAMS TO PROMOTE PHYSICAL ACTIVITY, GOOD NUTRITION AND DEVELOPMENT OF HEALTHY BEHAVIOR.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: PROVIDE ELIGIBLE PATIENTS ASSISTANCE IN APPLYING FOR ACCESS TO FREE - LOW COST PHARMACEUTICALS.

Form990PartVIISectionAGrp.PersonNm: JAMES E ROUNTREE SR ED D

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Coalition believes that it has appropriate support for any tax positions taken, and as such, does not have any uncertain tax positions that are material to the financial statements. Should any such penalties and interest be incurred, the Organization's policy would be to recognize them as management and general expenses. With limited exceptions, For years earlier than 2014, the Organization is no longer subject to income tax examinations by federal taxing authorities.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part III, Line 4d: Other Program Services Description
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES 4: PROVIDE ASSISTANCE AND SERVICES TO CANCER VICTIMS AND HOSPICE INDIVIDUALS. OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES 5: OTHER PROGRAMS

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 11b: Form 990 Review Process
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 WAS PROVIDED TO THE BOARD FOR REVIEW FOR TWO WEEKS TO PROVIDE FEEDBACK PRIOR TO FILING

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 12c: Explanation of Monitoring and Enforcement of Conflicts
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BOARD MEMBERS ARE REQUIRED TO SIGN ANNUAL STATEMENTS CONCERNING ANY POTENTIAL CONFLICTS

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 15a: Compensation Review & Approval Process - CEO, Top Management
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Compensation committee reviews salary comparables and makes a recommendation to the full board for the Executive Director's compensation package. The Board approved the compensation package.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 19: Other Organization Documents Publicly Available
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AVAILABLE UPON WRITTEN REQUEST TO THE FINANCE DIRECTOR.
